name: BigBang Blocks
description:
BigBang Blocks is a wonderful casual puzzle game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain.

On a summer seaside beach, drag the colored candy blocks onto the screen , and when a full row or column is reached, they can be eliminated and rewarded with gems. The relaxing soundtrack and beautiful graphics make every move a delight.

Key Features:
● Super addictive BLOCKS gameplay!
● No Time limite. Plan before you move!
● Make the Combo to get higher score
● Use the Hammer Tools to clear some squares
● Use the Swap Tools to swap the candidate blocks
● Collect more GEMS to redeem the Tools!

BigBang team is a team dedicated to bringing you fun and interesting puzzle games. Try our latest masterpiece!

Download this new blocks puzzle game to enjoy the endless fun!
